keyEvents.title: Kuzan Freezes Doflamingo
keyEvents.description: On Punk Hazard, Kuzan intervenes to save Smoker by freezing Doflamingo.
keyEvents.significance: One of the final major events to occur on Punk Hazard before all parties depart.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Departs
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo and his crew members leave Punk Hazard after the confrontation with Kuzan.
keyEvents.significance: Marks Doflamingo's final departure from the island.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates and their allies sail away from Punk Hazard on the Thousand Sunny.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the official end of the Punk Hazard Arc as the protagonists leave the island behind.

description: A former research facility split between fire and ice, Punk Hazard served as the setting for the alliance between the Straw Hats and Law. This episode marks the final departure from the island.

keyEvents.title: Departure from Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny carries the Straw Hats, Law, Caesar, Kin'emon, and Momonosuke away from Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the vessel for the alliance's journey to Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Momonosuke's Bath Time
keyEvents.description: Momonosuke takes advantage of his child appearance to bathe with Robin and get close to Nami.
keyEvents.significance: Provides comedic relief and character development aboard the ship.

keyEvents.title: Kin'emon Confronts Zoro
keyEvents.description: Kin'emon confronts Zoro about possessing Shusui, nearly leading to a duel aboard the ship.
keyEvents.significance: Creates tension between allies and establishes the cultural importance of Shusui.

keyEvents.title: Law Reveals the Plan
keyEvents.description: Law explains the full alliance plan to the Straw Hats aboard the Thousand Sunny.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the planning center for the alliance's strategy.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship serves as the main setting for this episode as the crew departs Punk Hazard and heads toward Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Dressrosa Revealed as Destination
keyEvents.description: Law reveals that Dressrosa, a kingdom ruled by Doflamingo, will be their next destination.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the next major arc and establishes the setting for the upcoming conflict.

description: A kingdom in the New World ruled by the Warlord Donquixote Doflamingo. Mentioned in this episode as the alliance's next destination.
